messages.text:
Hello, I'm Isaac, and I'm here to assist you with your robot programming task. 

When you use the block "Ask <question> with <answer options>. Save this answer in <numeric variable>" from the Message category, the answer options are encoded as numbers starting from 1. So, if you have 5 options, they will be represented as numbers from 1 to 5. 

For example, if you ask a question with options like "Red", "Blue", "Green", "Yellow", "Black", and the user selects "Green", the number 3 will be stored in the numeric variable because "Green" is the third option. 

Remember to use the Apply button to save your changes every time you update your program. Let me know if you have any other questions!
